meanings.definition: A prize or memento awarded for a specific achievement or victory.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her trophies on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The team celebrated their win with shiny trophies.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the mouse was a trophy to play with.
meanings.sent4: His smile was the trophy of his hard work.
meanings.sent5: The golden trophy gleamed under the spotlight.

meanings.definition: An object serving as a symbol of victory or success.
meanings.sent1: The trophy on his desk reminded him of his achievement.
meanings.sent2: The trophy case showcased their many successes.
meanings.sent3: The old watch became a trophy of his grandfather's time.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the trophy of a joyful heart.
meanings.sent5: The blooming flower was a trophy of her green thumb.
